reporter_caption.center: COLVIN v. ABBEY'S RESTAURANT, INC., Unpublished Decision (6-2-1999)

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from Summit App. Nos. 18196 and 18197.

opinion_text.unpublished:
Judgment reversed and cause remanded.
See opinion.
Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
